full_description: use one arm to grab the target object and put it in the basket, then use the other arm to grab the basket, and finally move the basket slightly away
schema: {A} notifies the target object, {B} notifies the basket, {a} notifies the arm to grab the target object. {b} notifies the arm to grab the basket
preference: num of words should not exceed 10. Degree of detail avg is six.

template_example.visual_state_description: I can see a playingcards and a basket on the table.
template_example.reasoning_and_reflection: It's the beginning of the task. The assistant info provides the functional points of basket and the pose of playingcards now. According the proper code of solution, I will output some actions to finish the target task.
template_example.language_plan: I will use left arm to grasp playingcards first. And then lift it up to avoid collision with the other objects. After that, I will place it to ideal position according to assistant info. Then I will open the gripper to release object and lift arm up to avoid collision with the basket. Then I will move arm away and grasp the basket with opposite arm. In the end, I will lift basket a bit after grasping.
